Hi Samir,

We have made updates to the site.
https://www.designtiles.com.au/product/opera-3-porcelain-floor-wall-tile/
https://www.designtiles.com.au/wp-admin/post.php?post=95266&action=edit

To setup the video, you need to set product video and then the placeholder image. The product video will show up next to first image with play icon overlay.

action.text: Heath Maguire assigned to Joel Maligalig

full_threads.body:
Hi Joel,

I hope this email finds you well.
Could you assist us with options for featuring videos on our product pages? We'd like to display a video in a similar layout to how we feature images. If there's a plugin that can help us achieve this functionality, we would greatly appreciate your help in installing and setting it up.

Ideally, we would like to achieve this
https://tilecloud.com.au/collections/colour-white-tiles/products/new-newport-matt-subway-white-tile?variant=32197674500145

Kind Regards,

Samir Bhatta
